about_the_game:
Innovative AOE-centric Skill Based Action Combat—The combat in Tormented Soul is extremely intuitive, unique, satisfying, and smooth—with the feel of a third-person shooter brought to fantasy action combat. The combat has added nuance and attention to detail—with the quickswap weapon system utilizing mid-ability swap buffering, there is animation cancels for players to master double-ultimate combos, and above all there is a need to aim your abilities accurately.

Matchmaking backfills additional players as you play—All matches are found, regardless of whether its a single party or a full lobby, in around 60 seconds or less—while you are playing we are actively matchmaking for players to add to the match. Our chat system will let you know when players join—so you can jump into the action and still be aware when your corrupted loot is becoming more risky to hold. All progression systems are long-term, meaning joining a match late won't impact your ability to hold your own. While we are early days, we are going to match party members together, but team assignments will be randomized. So bring a group of friends and have fun competing against each other!

Ultra-Rare Ancient Equipment!

Ultra-rare ancient equipment has a chance to drop from gathering, PvM, & PvP. The piece of Ancient Equipment dropped depends on what you are gathering or slaying.

Keep your items and progression for the season!

At the start of each game, your inventory and gear is loaded from a database. Resources and gear progression are kept for the season.

Enchant & Regrade your gear—continuous progression for the season!

Resources held at the end of the match or extracted back to base are cleansed and retained from game to game. These resources can be used to enchant and regrade your gear.

Build Custom Loadouts & Swap Mid-Match. Enchants & Regrades apply to gear slots.

Loadout system—Provides you the flexibility to change your playstyle mid-match. Spend hours crafting the perfect build in our Main Menu loadout builder choosing from over 110 armor, weapons, & gems. 

Innovative Seamless Combat-Gathering—Over 180 unique items to obtain.

Utilize your combat abilities to impact the environment and gather resources.

High-Stakes PvP. Partial loot—Corrupt items transfer in PvP—cleanse items at base.

RNG+ system—Corrupted items, which are lost on PvP death, provide a corruption score which increases your luck to incentivize your risk. This is a scaling system that provides you with a better chance at higher drop tables throughout various activities and it also provides a boosted chance to obtain Ultra-Rare Ancient Equipment drops.


Item Value-based Team Scoring with 51 Ranks to climb—Our team-based gameplay is similar to factions. Choose to help your teammates or run away laughing as they get swarmed and you keep your hard-earned loot. If you want to climb ranks fast though, securing as much value for your team as possible is your goal. Ranks reward valuable base stat bonuses. Whether your hunting enemies alone, farming bosses as a team, or working in smaller groups—there is a wide range of playstyles supported.

Ascend to a Slayer! Exciting Killstreak Buffs with radiating auras.

Receive additional power at 3, 5, 10, and 20 kills in a row. Climb the ranks with killstreaks that reward you with radiating power. Achieve 3, 5, 10, and 20 consecutive kills to unlock powerful buffs and an aura that strikes fear into your enemies. Reach a 20-kill streak and ascend to the status of Slayer, unleashing devastating damage in an explosion of heavenly power, causing even the heavens to hear of your achievement. Will your name echo across the battlefield?

content_descriptors.notes: Lots of Fantasy Battles. Fantasy combat fights with other players, humanoids, and monsters. Trash talk voice-acted lines via an emote wheel system, text "All/Team" chat with up to 32 players in a game. (Text chat hideable.)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790K or AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700K or AMD Ryzen 7 3700X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 or AMD Radeon RX 6600XT
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space

short_description: Team-Based Fantasy Extraction Arena where risk is rewarded. PvPvE featuring AOE-centric skill based action combat with continuous gear progression. Gather resources, defeat monsters, bring down bosses, best your foes, and acquire Ultra-Rare Ancient Equipment.
